device.description:
The name of your sound output device e.g. "Speakers (Realtek(R) Audio)".
* "[default]" means that emulator should use OS default audio device.
* "[null]" means that emulator should not send the received data to any of audio devices.

volume.description: Master volume for every emulator's sound output.

padspeakers.description:
Host audio devices for each of connected gamepads.
* "[null]" means that emulator should not send the received data to any of audio devices.
